page.title: 06GLOVER'S FARM, LITTLEPORT
page.content: This{mixed}farm is on the road to Mildenhall some miles out of the village. It is mainly{arable}on peat. It has changed by having more modern buildings like potato sheds and the {piggeries.}On the farm there are over three hundred pigs.The oldest animal is a six year old sow. There are one hundred and seventy two acres.The main things grown are sugar beet, potatoes and wheat.The farmer thinks that machinery is a lot better now than it was in the olden days.The oldest tractor he has is eighteen years old. He said that farming is a very full-time job. Winter is the hardest season but spring is usually the worst for weather. The hardest thing to grow on the farm is wheat because it needs a lot of care. The farm is 120 years old.
